website_summaries.verdict: This set made from stainless steel can do a good job without getting dull for most metalworking applications.
pros: Cuts through stainless steel and other metals
Seem to stay sharp through many uses
Metal case with metal holders inside the case
cons: This is only a 15-piece drill bit set and does not include all the sizes of other sets

customer_reviews.title: Great bits, but shorter than common jobber bits.
customer_reviews.text: I've always bought these in singles locally, but decided to get the set. They are superior to any bit I've ever purchased at a big box store. I have never actually known what "jobber" bits were, but I think it designates longer than these "mechanic" length bits. Not a problem for me, but maybe useful knowledge for a prospective buyer. Anyway, these bits are worth the cost if you are working with metal.
customer_reviews.author: Bill D. Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Norseman drill bit set
customer_reviews.text: The quality that you would expect from Norseman. A nice set of USA made drill bits that don't dull or break after using them a couple times, like cheaper overseas made bits. They should cover most of your drilling needs except maybe some of your more extreme conditions where one of there cobalt or carbide bits is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Stull

customer_reviews.title: rwiz97
customer_reviews.text: This product did not get the job done. This was unable to dig into the metal.
customer_reviews.author: RANSFORD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with their sharpness. They stay sharp too! BestI have used. I am an electrician.
customer_reviews.author: Grillmaster53

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value proposition
customer_reviews.text: Cut fast smooth holes. Much better value proposition than the "typical" brands. Can't say anything about durability or longevity at this point but I hope i dont have to ever buy another set of metal drilling bits again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy A Wanamaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ser of Drill Bitts
customer_reviews.text: A nice set of drill bits, not cheap metal or copper. Work well after many uses.
customer_reviews.author: The King

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Drilled through 1/2" thick steel in about 1 minute with a cheap pneumatic drill (at 700rpm). Never had good results drilling thick metal or bolts (even with cobalt bits) before using these.Best i've ever used. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: mec

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice USA product and SO MUCH BETTER than most all of the typical name brand retail junk offered. My only wish would be a plastic case instead of the metal case. The metal is heavy and bulky to pack or carry.
customer_reviews.author: CBeaman

customer_reviews.title: Like the box and set up of the drill bits. Excited to use them more
customer_reviews.text: Looks don't know durability yet but looks and feels like quality
customer_reviews.author: Glen Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: They're descent.
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but does the job.Just have to keep them sharp and they do a god job.I use the drill.dr 350x.
customer_reviews.author: Pavichi

customer_reviews.title: Someone getting sloppy
customer_reviews.text: All as advertised except that the 1/2 " drill bit was not in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Selinger

customer_reviews.title: Great USA-made twist drills.  Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very hard webbing with extremely sharp cutting edge, and soft, 3-jaw-chuck-fluted shanks. Some of the best HSS bits I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D, Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cut about like my Triumph drill bits
customer_reviews.text: Work very well. Cut about like my Triumph drill bits, which says a lot.
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice set!! Great quality drill bits. Cuts through steel like butter and made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: David Torres

customer_reviews.title: These have held up great. I mainly use them for wood working and ...
customer_reviews.text: These have held up great. I mainly use them for wood working and use on hard woods almost exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of drills. Good material Good price I"m a 30 yr machine builder.
customer_reviews.author: hobbslotus

product_meta.title: Norseman Drill and Tool 66470 SPM-15 135 Degree Split Point Magnum Sup Premium Mechanical Drill Bit Set (15 Piece)
product_meta.description: Committed to Quality, Consistency, Service and Value QUALITY at Viking Drill and Tool begins with the finest tool steel we can buy and ends with the world class products in our catalog. Our cutting tools are designed, engineered and superbly crafted to provide long lasting durability. Our 74,000 square foot St. Paul, Minnesota manufacturing facility is specifically designed for the unique task of efficient high quality cutting tool manufacturing. CONSISTENCY is a natural by-product of our experience and dedication to quality. At Viking Drill and Tool, skilled machine operators working with the world's finest raw materials have the capability of providing you with consistent high quality products time after time, year after year. On our Ultra Bor Super Premium products, we routinely cut recognized tool tolerance standards by one half to insure that our customers receive drills manufactured to the tightest possible specification and utmost in consistency and accuracy. All materials used at Viking Drill and Tool meet the rigorous qualifications of National Aerospace Standard (NAS) 907. This standard, recognized as the most stringent in the industry precludes the use of lower quality steels which do not hold up under rigorous applications. The use of these extreme high quality materials insures that consistency is built in to every one of our U.S. manufactured products. Our extensive selection of U.S. manufactured tools is designed to give you the right tool at the right price for whatever tough job you come up against.
feature_bullets: 15 pc. Set Premium Mechanic 3-Flats on Shank 135-Degree Split Point
135-Degree split point for accurate centering and fast penetration
Precision ground point, flutes, body, clearance and drill diameter for ultimate accuracy and performance
Mechanics Length 3-flats on shank 3/16 and larger

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars39 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
